Html: Like the title says, we're open to new feature requests.  If you have an idea you'd like to see in the app, let us know.

Currently, we're working on adding a new pre-processing framework to the application.  We think this will allow better normalization of the images, and improved results when images have been heavily edited (for example, color inversion, embossed images, etc.)  We're also considering a few other algorithms (including a full-blown version of MSSIM, using the gaussian weighting).
